p: The essential oils obtained from N. megapotamica in the states of São Paulo (S) and Mato Grosso do Sul (C, M, and P) were analyzed by GC-MS (geographic distribution map– S1 Fig, Supplementary Material). The compounds identified were phenylpropanoids (up to 52.7%), monoterpene hydrocarbons (up to 19.9%), sesquiterpene hydrocarbons (up to 92.3%), oxygenated sesquiterpene (up to 94.5%) and others (up to 4.5%). The compounds are described in Table 2.
